alert.note: Alert for Northern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 18 at 1:35PM PST until November 20 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT PST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 70 mph possible for Interstate 5 Corridor. * WHERE...Northern Ventura County Mountains and Western Antelope Valley Foothills. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight PST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
